categories.name: Air Powered Roller Coaster
categories.construction: Track consists of steel girders built upon massive supports. Trains run on classical rubber tires to give the guests a smoother ride, with up-stop wheels below the track; and are air-propelled in order to complete the track.

categories.name: Bobsleigh Coaster
categories.construction: Track is a semi-circular channel, supported by tubular steel posts. Cars run on small wheels, and are free to take their own course along the track, guided only by the curvature and gradient of the channel.

categories.name: Compact Inverted Coaster
categories.construction: Track has a tubular steel spine, connected to the outside edges of tubular steel running rails. Supports are large tubular steel posts. Trains hang underneath the track, held in position by wheels above, below, and inside the running rails.
prebuilt_designs: Vampire (Six Flags Belgium) (Can't be saved as pre-built ride. OpenRCT2 removed this limit)

categories.name: Corkscrew Roller Coaster
categories.construction: Track has a tubular steel spine, connected to the outside edges of tubular steel running rails. Supports are large tubular steel posts. Trains are held on the track by wheels above, below, and inside the running rails.
prebuilt_designs: Boomerang (requires the Half Loop and Vertical Loop track elements)
Defibrillator (Funtopia) – it uses the Boomerang track, but is repainted a maroon color
Great American Scream Machine (Six Flags Great Adventure)

categories.name: Flying Roller Coaster
categories.construction: Track has a square-section steel spine, connected to the inside edges of tubular steel running rails. Supports are large tubular steel posts. Trains are held on the track by wheels below and inside the running rails. Unlike Lay-down Roller Coaster, this ride starts with upside-down station, has fewer compatible inversions but gives more excitement and is easier to design.

categories.name: Giga Coaster
categories.construction: A giant steel roller coaster capable of smooth drops and hills of over 300 feet.

categories.name: Heartline Twister Coaster
categories.construction: The track consists of tubular steel running rails running through circular steel hoops. Cars run centrally between the rails, allowing heartline twists.

categories.name: Inverted Hairpin Coaster
categories.construction: Track consists of tubular steel rails. Supports are large tubular steel posts. Cars hang under the track, held on by wheels above, below, and outside the running rails.

categories.name: Inverted Impulse Coaster
categories.construction: Inverted roller coaster trains are accelerated out of the station to travel up a vertical spike of track,then reverse back through the station to travel backwards up another vertical spike of track.

categories.name: Inverted Roller Coaster
categories.construction: Track has a square-section steel spine, connected to the inside edges of tubular steel running rails. Supports are large square-section steel posts. Trains hang underneath the track, held in position by wheels above, below and outside the running rails.
